text: It’s a very friendly and helpful church. The folks were all very welcoming. Someone was locked in the toilet at carpark and the staff came immediately to help my friend.

The people in this church is friendly and welcoming. The worship is simple with the presence of God. Thank you to pastor Mark who I met at the lift and the usher lady who I met at the parking area. Jesus knows their heart. Both of them are the pillar of this church.

I agree with the convenient chairs. But you won’t fall asleep because the sermon is powerful. Lot of teachings that will strengthen the congregation.
Very kind pastor, with a heart of gold! Thank you for your kindness today! - Serene
Family based church to learn more on God's word. English, Chinese n Teochew service available.
Friendly and warmth people. Place condusive. Can feel accepted, close fellowship.
